data.name: 0000 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay everyone, you all understand what we're doing, right?

data.name: 0001 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Y-yes--! We need to check through the materials to see if there are any past cases...

data.name: 0002 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: ...linked to the music room... right?

data.name: 0003 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina answered incredibly seriously, but the truth is, we don't want to look for...

data.name: 0004 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...evidence of ghosts, we want to find the opposite--evidence that there are no ghosts.

data.name: 0005 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then let's all split up and search.

data.name: 0006 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, I won't excuse any slacking from you! You got that?!

data.name: 0007 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why are you directing that solely at me?

data.name: 0008 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't that obvious?

data.name: 0009 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're the only one who seems like they might slack off.

data.name: 0010 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Gh...

data.name: 0011 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She really got me there--I can't even retort.

data.name: 0012 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll come check on you every so often, so you'd better take this seriously.

data.name: 0014 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, got it.

data.name: 0015 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maintaining her usual energy, Haruhi dashed off to...

data.name: 0016 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...the book case on the opposite side.

data.name: 0017 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Does she seriously not even have the common sense to be quiet in a library...?

data.name: 0018 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then... I'll guess I'll try to kill some time?

data.name: 0019 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It wouldn't be a bad idea to discuss our plan going forward with Asahina or Nagato.

data.name: 0020 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina.

data.name: 0021 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I called to Asahina, who was facing the bookcase with a serious look on her face.

data.name: 0022 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She jumped as if she were surprised and looked back at me.

data.name: 0023 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Wh-what is it--?!

data.name: 0024 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Please don't be so scared... What are you searching?

data.name: 0025 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah, I'm searching this school's history…

data.name: 0026 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Asahina.

data.name: 0027 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't actually have to seriously search, you know?

data.name: 0028 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Eh?

data.name: 0029 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like... the whole ghost thing is just one of Haruhi's fantasies, you know.

data.name: 0030 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You can fish through historical documents all you want, and you're not going to find anything.

data.name: 0031 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: But... Kyon.

data.name: 0032 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina looked at me as if she were troubled by something before asking me...

data.name: 0033 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: What if... What if we really did find evidence of ghosts…

data.name: 0034 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I immediately realized what Asahina was worrying about.

data.name: 0035 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's worried that Haruhi's conviction about the situation might cause evidence of ghosts...

data.name: 0036 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...that should never exist to show up.

data.name: 0037 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you really do find any evidence like that, you should keep it a secret.

data.name: 0038 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Considering that, it's probably best to try and find that kind of thing before Haruhi does.

data.name: 0039 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: O-okay.

data.name: 0040 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina and I split up and searched, but we couldn't find anything significant.

data.name: 0041 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: At least as far as we can see, it doesn't seem like there's anything like that.

data.name: 0042 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It seems so... I'm glad it didn't turn out worse…

data.name: 0043 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina looked relieved, and I myself felt pretty relieved on the inside too.

data.name: 0045 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, Nagato.

data.name: 0046 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I called out to Nagato, who was getting absorbed in some books from the bookcase.

data.name: 0047 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What?

data.name: 0048 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Do you really think there are any clues about ghostly behavior in here?

data.name: 0049 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: If Haruhi Suzumiya strongly believes there is a relevant book here, the likelihood...

data.name: 0050 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ...isn't low.

data.name: 0051 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn it, well that's convenient...

data.name: 0052 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: But surely we wouldn't find it, rather she would find it herself, right?

data.name: 0053 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Haruhi Suzumiya herself is in doubt, so she cannot find it herself.

data.name: 0054 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That... really is convenient, huh.

data.name: 0055 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, did you find anything yourself, Nagato?

data.name: 0056 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Actually, it looks like she's just reading a detective novel, huh.

data.name: 0057 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What're you reading?

data.name: 0058 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Detective novel.

data.name: 0059 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I figured out that much.

data.name: 0060 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's unique in that what is initially believed to be an unnatural phenomenon...

data.name: 0061 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ...turns out to be human-caused.

data.name: 0062 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Since she's explaining the plot so smoothly, I guess this is a reread?

data.name: 0063 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Actually, never mind that, the plot she's explaining is really interesting.

data.name: 0064 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I see... if we can convince Haruhi that what she believes is simply a trick...

data.name: 0065 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...she might lose interest.

data.name: 0066 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, thanks for the hint.

data.name: 0067 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …I am merely observing.

data.name: 0068 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I shouldn't be doing anything that would deserve thanks.

data.name: 0069 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We'll leave it at that then.

data.name: 0071 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though... It's pretty tedious turning these materials upside down when...

data.name: 0072 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...we know there's nothing to find...

data.name: 0073 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Listening to Haruhi's impossible demands might even be better if this is what we're doing…

data.name: 0074 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It probably isn't good that I was thinking such things.

data.name: 0075 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, how's it going over there?

data.name: 0076 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A-ah?! ...I-I haven't found anything notable yet...

data.name: 0077 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't show up out of nowhere like that--it's only natural it'd surprise me.

data.name: 0078 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You need me to book an appointment or some- thing? Who're you to pretend to be some VIP?

data.name: 0079 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Since when were you so great?

data.name: 0080 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …It's a figure of speech.

data.name: 0081 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm... Well, whatever.

data.name: 0082 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: More importantly, I need some manpower.

data.name: 0083 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon and... one other, come help me.

data.name: 0084 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You want manpower?

data.name: 0085 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This is an investigation, not some renovation, you know?

data.name: 0086 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I get that of course.

data.name: 0087 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Anyway, decide who's helping and come with me.

data.name: 0088 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: H-hey...?

data.name: 0089 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi just ignored me and headed back where she came from.

data.name: 0090 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seems like ignoring her is just gonna get us in trouble…

data.name: 0091 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess I'll just do as she asks for now.

data.name: 0092 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She asked me to bring someone else with me, right...? Asahina or Nagato...?

data.name: 0093 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, who should I ask?

data.name: 0094 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I brought Asahina along with me and headed over to Haruhi.

data.name: 0095 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, is this where you went...? Whoa, what's this?!

data.name: 0096 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Fuwawaa...! That's amazing--that mountain of books.

data.name: 0097 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, Mikuru? Don't touch that, it's dangerous--it'll fall down!

data.name: 0098 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Hya--?!

data.name: 0099 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, more importantly--what is this...?

data.name: 0100 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Can't you tell? They're books--It's a mountain of books.

data.name: 0101 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm trying to ask why you made such a thing.

data.name: 0102 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I had no choice. When I gathered every book that looked like it could have some clue...

data.name: 0103 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...there just turned out to be this many.

data.name: 0104 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But it's clearly more than I can search by myself.

data.name: 0105 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's why I wanted help.

data.name: 0106 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: S-so... we're going to split all of this between us and read it all...?

data.name: 0107 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly. Well then, let's get straight to it#W10…#W20…#W30

data.name: 0108 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Watch out, Asahina!

data.name: 0109 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Huh?

data.name: 0110 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina touched the mountain of books, which caused some kind of chain reaction.

data.name: 0111 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The summit started wobbling and leaning…

data.name: 0112 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Wait, hold on, this is dangerous isn't it?

data.name: 0113 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina--!!

data.name: 0114 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I rushed over to Asahina in a panic, grabbed her hand and pulled her away.

data.name: 0115 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ky-Kyon--?! Kyaa--?!

data.name: 0116 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: An avalanche started before Asahina's eyes and the tsunami grazed the tip of her nose.

data.name: 0117 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you okay, Asahina?

data.name: 0118 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Th... that was surprising...

data.name: 0119 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Without time to breathe a sigh of relief, we were assaulted by a screaming voice.

data.name: 0120 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey! You two--what are you doing clinging to each other?!

data.name: 0121 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thanks to that I realized just how wonderful a situation I was in.

data.name: 0122 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I had a soft and small Asahina between my arms…

data.name: 0123 (404.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ah... No!

data.name: 0124 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina--red-faced--slipped out through my arms.

data.name: 0125 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ah, I wanted to stay like that a little longer…

data.name: 0126 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon! Groping Asahina is easy justification for your execution, you know!

data.name: 0127 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why?!

data.name: 0128 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: This only happened because you decided to make that pointless stack of books!

data.name: 0129 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: For a man to complain about such trivial things... It's shameful!

data.name: 0130 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Anyway, you'd better get on and investigate these materials!

data.name: 0131 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We've only got so much time after all--!

data.name: 0132 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We read through the materials carefully while Haruhi was cracking the whip over us...

data.name: 0133 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...but we were never able to find anything notable.

data.name: 0134 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, nothing like that exists in the first place so it's only natural...

data.name: 0135 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I brought Nagato with me and headed over to Haruhi.

data.name: 0136 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haruhi, is this where you went...? Whoa, what's this?!

data.name: 0137 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Books.

data.name: 0138 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Um, Nagato--I can figure that much out by myself.

data.name: 0139 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What I can't figure out is why there are this many books stacked up so high.

data.name: 0141 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't that obvious?

data.name: 0142 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi came into view, reclining behind the mountain of books.

data.name: 0143 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're gonna divide all these books and search them. I'm certain there's a clue in here.

data.name: 0144 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You mean all of this?!

data.name: 0145 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's why I called you over, right?

data.name: 0146 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, if you understand, get to it.

data.name: 0147 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Say what you want, but this pile of books Haruhi has clearly had a lot of fun stacking...

data.name: 0148 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...looks seriously precarious. The whole thing seems like it'd fall over if you just touch it.

data.name: 0149 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Where are you even supposed to this thi... H-hey, Nagato?!

data.name: 0150 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While I was struggling, Nagato approached the mountain of books and reached out.

data.name: 0151 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Watch out! It's gonna fall!

data.name: 0152 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It's fine.

data.name: 0153 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As if it's fine--I'm telling you it's dangerous...! ...is what I thought, but as a matter of fact...

data.name: 0154 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato took her hand to a book and pulled it out smoothly.

data.name: 0155 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's... not falling down, huh.

data.name: 0156 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: If you consider the balance, and take a book from the point under least stress…

data.name: 0157 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ...it won't fall. It's simple.

data.name: 0158 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Simple, huh…

data.name: 0159 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's amazing, Yuki! It's as if you were playing some puzzle game!

data.name: 0160 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is that really what you should be saying as the creator of this thing?

data.name: 0161 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay! Next is my turn.

data.name: 0162 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Listen to people when they're talking to you! Anyway, are you trying to make this a game?

data.name: 0163 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi stared at the mountain of books, wide-eyed.

data.name: 0164 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She then swiftly pulled out a book.

data.name: 0165 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Got one--!

data.name: 0166 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Whoa...!

data.name: 0167 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For a moment the mountain of books started to wobble, but it gradually calmed down.

data.name: 0168 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hehe...! What do you think?

data.name: 0169 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …It's no big deal--You were just lucky.

data.name: 0170 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How about you test if I was really just lucky? Go on, it's your turn now.

data.name: 0171 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You want me to do that as well?!

data.name: 0172 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course I do!

data.name: 0173 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …It feels like it's turned into some sort of game tournament or something…

data.name: 0174 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess it's not so bad as long as it's keeping Haruhi distracted.

data.name: 0175 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I probably shouldn't have reached for the books while I was still thinking about that.

data.name: 0176 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ouch--!

data.name: 0177 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I had a shower of solid books fall on my head. Why do I have to put up with this stuff…

data.name: 0178 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A-ha-ha! How pathetic!

data.name: 0179 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Don't point at me... Don't laugh at me...

data.name: 0180 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While I was still stuck under the books, a hand reached out to me.

data.name: 0181 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Stand.

data.name: 0182 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Y-yeah.

data.name: 0183 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I was a little flustered as Nagato pulled me up by my hand.

data.name: 0184 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: と、思いのほか力強く長門が俺を 引き起こしてくれた

data.name: 0185 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ありがとうな、長門

data.name: 0186 (404.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: いい 大したことはしていない

data.name: 0187 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: いや、それでも……

data.name: 0188 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ほらほら、そんなことはどうでも いいから、早く立ちなさいって！

data.name: 0189 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺と長門の間に、ハルヒの奴が 割って入ってくる

data.name: 0190 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: その辺にキョンがばらまいた本は 責任持って片付けるのよ

data.name: 0191 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 俺の責任かよ！？

data.name: 0192 (404.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: 当たり前じゃない 崩したのはキョンなんだから

data.name: 0193 (404.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: 納得いかん、納得いかんぞ……

data.name: 0194 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 俺はぶつぶつとぼやきながら本を 片付けた

data.name: 0195 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: 結局その後の調査でも、それらしい 情報を見付けることは出来なかった

data.name: 0196 (404.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: まあ、元々存在しないのだから当た り前のことなのだが

data.name: 0197 (404.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 朝比奈さんと相談しよう

data.name: 0198 (404.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 長門と相談しよう

data.name: 0199 (404.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 朝比奈さん

data.name: 0200 (404.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: 長門
